description:
A free, powerful, multi-purpose tool that helps you monitor system resources, debug software and detect malware.

Process Hacker was started in 2008 as an open source alternative to programs such as Task Manager and Process Explorer.

#### Documentation
* [Screenshots](http://processhacker.sourceforge.net/)
* [Features](https://sourceforge.net/projects/processhacker#project-features)
* [FAQ](http://processhacker.sourceforge.net/faq.php)
* [Developer docs](http://processhacker.sourceforge.net/doc/)
* [Developer stats](https://www.openhub.net/p/processhacker)

#### Community
* [Forum](http://processhacker.sourceforge.net/forums/)
summary: View and manage processes, services and more with this TaskMgr alternative
author: Wen Jia Liu
